pkgmetadata.longdescription: Functions for Calculating Daily Solar Radiation and Evapotranspiration // Sirad package provides functions for: (1) calculating daily global solar radiation at horizontal surface using several well-known models (i.e. Angstrom-Prescott, Supit- Van Kappel, Hargreaves, Bristow and Campbell, and Mahmood- Hubbard), (2) model calibration based on ground-truth data, and (3) model auto-calibration. The FAO Penmann-Monteith equation to calculate evapotranspiration is also included.
